plot outline: Film is set in one winter night in Delhi where a middle class, Delhi university guy falls in love with a girl anchoring a fashion show. In process of wooing her someone plants a sting operation tape in his pocket. This sting operation has a minister talking of buying and selling MLAs and media heads from his Swiss bank accounts. Unknown to this he is chased by corrupt cops and good guys to get that tape back. Soon he gets to know of tape with him and it's high relevance. How this university student who always talked against corruption like any layman, now gets bribed himself by the big offer thrown by Minster's man constitutes the edge of the seat climax of story.
title: Kismet Love Paisa Dilli
plot: Film is set in one winter night in Delhi where a middle class, Delhi university guy falls in love with a girl anchoring a fashion show. In process of wooing her someone plants a sting operation tape in his pocket. This sting operation has a minister talking of buying and selling MLAs and media heads from his Swiss bank accounts. Unknown to this he is chased by corrupt cops and good guys to get that tape back. Soon he gets to know of tape with him and it's high relevance. How this university student who always talked against corruption like any layman, now gets bribed himself by the big offer thrown by Minster's man constitutes the edge of the seat climax of story.::Kalra S

A Delhi university guy is after a girl he likes in a fashion show. In process he comes across a sting operation tape of a politician buying ministers for his government. Guy who use to talk big against 'corruption' comes in lure of money like any layman does on opportunity.::Savi

This film is a satire on corruption which is set in one winter night in Delhi where a middle class, Delhi university guy falls in love with a girl anchoring a fashion show. In process of wooing her someone plants a sting operation tape in his pocket. This sting operation has a minister talking of buying and selling MLAs and media heads from his Swiss bank accounts. Unknown to this he is chased by corrupt cops and good guys to get that tape back. Soon he gets to know of tape with him and it's high relevance. How this university student who always talked against corruption like any layman, now gets bribed himself by the big offer thrown by Minster's man constitutes the thrilling end.::Singh P
synopsis:
Shooted in Delhi Kismet Love Paisa Dilli (KLPD) is a one night story of Lokesh (Vivek Oberoi) and Lovina (Mallika Sherawat). Lokesh is a college going middle class guy and Lovina is the girl next door, who miss their last metro back home and a series of on the edge moments occur through the night where Lokesh and Lovina run across Delhi in night from cold streets to glitzy farm house parties all...to gradually fall in love. Also some trouble also occurs due to a sinster Minister who wants his video tape back as it consists his sting operation. Also there is also a great suspense at the climax of the film. The consists of full-on comedy dialogues and all the actors performed brilliantly. Dialogues have good punch which creats good comedy as well as some are rhyming too.
It has good Haryanvi accent in dialogues which is usually seen in Delhi people.
Characters such as "Nunnu", "Kaptaan Saab"(Ashutosh Rana) , "Lokesh", Gay Fashion Designer were awesome and were also very funny.
The film consist of clever and funny humour with good music.
The location i.e Delhi is being propely presented.
Therefore the conclusion which I come at after watching KLPD is "Its full-on madness with a message of corruption in Delhi".Though the film didn't worked well at Box- Office, its only because I think that there is misunderstanding between Vivek Oberoi and Salman Khan so.... this awesome film was not let go to its level through politics in industry.
